name.value: BgZ MSZ - Client - Scenario 1.2 - Retrieve BgZ resources of G S Al-Ksar-GHAN-NOERMOHAMED-ELIK

description.value: Scenario 1.2 - Retrieve BgZ resources of G S Al-Ksar-GHAN-NOERMOHAMED-ELIK
retrieve Patient resource including the patient's general practitioner for HCIM Patient
Test Client to retrieve Patient resources.
Make sure that the server of the test simulator gives a success response.
Confirm that the server of the test simulator returns a Bundle.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Patient resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 2 Practitioner resource(s).
